item.description: These are some facts that I’ve found useful, but I don’t think they really warrant their own page. Let $A,B$ be [[Set]]s.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I grew up in Dayton, Ohio. We’re big enough to be on a map, but small enough that you probably don’t know where it is.

item.title: Evolution and its relationship with Agents
item.description: We think of a [[Genetic Algorithm]] as evolving an [[Organism]], but it is really evolving particular [[Gene]]s. The [[Organism]], or abstractly the [[Agent]], is simply the carrier for those genes.

item.title: Home Page
item.description: Hi, I’m Abhijeet, a mathematics student at UIC I’m a first-year PhD student specializing in machine learning and information theory.

item.title: House Rules and Conventions
item.description: I’ve been working on this for a while and feel like I have to come up with the same conventions everytime I write because I’m not sure what the prior convention was.

item.title: Math Wiki
